sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import CalendarModal from './CalendarModal'; const CommunicationHub = ({ onBack, onEmails, onTemplates, onBulkEmail, clients }) => { const [showCalendar, setShowCalendar] = useState(false); const communicationStats = { totalEmails: 45, unreadEmails: 12, sentThisWeek: 23, responseRate: '78%' }; const quickActions = [ { id: 'emails', title: 'Email Management', description: 'Manage client emails, inbox, and sent items', icon: 'fas fa-envelope', color: '#1a472a', action: onEmails, stats: `${communicationStats.totalEmails} Total Emails` }, { id: 'templates', title: 'Email Templates', description: 'Create and manage email templates for quick communication', icon: 'fas fa-layer-group', color: '#d4af37', action: onTemplates, stats: '12 Templates Available' }, { id: 'bulk-email', title: 'Bulk Email', description: 'Send emails to multiple clients at once', icon: 'fas fa-mail-bulk', color: '#2d5a3a', action: onBulkEmail, stats: `${clients.length} Clients Available` }, { id: 'analytics', title: 'Communication Analytics', description: 'View communication metrics and performance', icon: 'fas fa-chart-bar', color: '#1a472a', action: () => console.log('Analytics'), stats: `${communicationStats.responseRate} Response Rate` } ]; const recentActivities = [ { id: 1, type: 'email', client: 'GreenTech Initiative', action: 'Email Sent', time: '2 hours ago', status: 'sent' }, { id: 2, type: 'template', client: 'All Clients', action: 'Template Created', time: '1 day ago', status: 'completed' }, { id: 3, type: 'bulk', client: '5 Clients', action: 'Bulk Email Scheduled', time: '2 days ago', status: 'scheduled' } ]; const upcomingCommunications = [ { id: 1, date: new Date(2024, 10, 15), title: "Follow-up: Sarah Chen", description: "Grant proposal discussion and next steps", type: "Email Reminder", time: "10:00 AM", actions: ["Reschedule", "Send Now"] }, { id: 2, date: new Date(2024, 10, 16), title: "Bulk Update: All Active Clients", description: "Quarterly grant opportunities newsletter", type: "Bulk Email", clientCount: 12, time: "9:00 AM", actions: ["Edit Template", "Preview"] } ]; const calendarEvents = upcomingCommunications.map(comm => ({ date: comm.date, time: comm.time, title: comm.title })); return (

Communication Hub

Centralized platform for all client communication management

{/* Stats Overview */}

{communicationStats.totalEmails}

Total Emails

+12%

{communicationStats.unreadEmails}

Unread Emails

-5%

{communicationStats.sentThisWeek}

Sent This Week

+8%

{communicationStats.responseRate}

Response Rate

+15%
{/* Quick Actions Grid */}

Quick Actions

{quickActions.map(action => (

{action.title}

{action.description}

{action.stats}
))}
{/* Recent Activity & Communication Tools */}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

{recentActivities.map(activity => (

{activity.action} for {activity.client}

{activity.time}
{activity.status}
))}
{/* Communication Tools */}

Communication Tools

Quick Compose

Start a new email immediately

Schedule Emails

Plan emails for optimal timing

Analytics

View communication insights

Settings

Configure communication preferences

{/* Upcoming Communications */}

Upcoming Communications

{upcomingCommunications.map(comm => (
{comm.date.getDate()}
{comm.date.toLocaleString('default', { month: 'short' }).toUpperCase()}
{comm.title}
{comm.description}
{comm.type}
{comm.time}
{comm.clientCount && (
{comm.clientCount} Clients
)}
{comm.actions.map((action, index) => ( ))}
))}
{/* Calendar Modal */} setShowCalendar(false)} events={calendarEvents} />
); }; export default CommunicationHub;
